sentences.en: All magma consists basically of a variety of silicate minerals.
sentences.cn: 所有的岩浆基本上都由各种硅酸盐矿物质构成.

sentences.en: C: Between swamps and magma , we will die here!
sentences.cn: 克鲁德: 前有沼泽,右有岩浆, 我们完了!

sentences.en: Crude: Come on, get on! Magma is coming!
sentences.cn: 克鲁德: 还不快上来, 岩浆 就要来了!

sentences.en: Derived from magma poured out or ejected at the earth's surface.
sentences.cn: 火山的来自于喷出或喷在地表的岩浆的.

sentences.en: Eruptions begin with an upwelling of magma from earths hot interior.
sentences.cn: 火山爆发,始于岩浆从地球炽热的内部涌出.

sentences.en: In many places surface rocks have been melted, baked by the heat of magma beneath.
sentences.cn: 地表岩石在许多地方被地下岩浆热量所熔化 、 所烘烤.

sentences.en: It immediately after is a branch road which spreads all over magma.
sentences.cn: 接着是一处遍布岩浆的岔路口.

sentences.en: Magma surged into the volcano from the Earth's mantle.
sentences.cn: 岩浆从地球的地幔涌入火山.

sentences.en: Shape became magma: deformations and distortions, curves , elliptical, cellular, molecular shapes.
sentences.cn: 外形变患上恍惚: 变型和扭曲, 曲线,卵形, 蜂窝状的, 分子的外形.

sentences.en: The magma submerged the whole city when the volcano erupted.
sentences.cn: 火山爆发的时候,岩浆岩把整个城市都淹没了.

sentences.en: The main ore fluid was magma water mixed with meteoric water.
sentences.cn: 成矿流体是以岩浆水为主,混有古大气水的混合流体.

sentences.en: The ore controlling condition is mainly composed of strata, magma, and structure.
sentences.cn: 主要控矿条件包括地层 、 构造和岩浆岩.

sentences.en: The volcano threw new showers of magma and ash into the air.
sentences.cn: 火山又向空中喷出了岩浆和火山灰。

sentences.en: This rock type originates in the magma chambers that underlie volcanoes.
sentences.cn: 这种岩石源自火山底下的岩浆库.
